item.title: First blogpost
item.description: Hi This is my hello blogdown world. ðŸ˜„ Here is a tweet with information on regutools: Gracias a @josschavezf1 por retomar el proyecto que inicie junto con @EmilianoSotel10 hace tiempo, me da mucho gusto ver como se va consolidando! Gracias tambien a la excelente tutoria de @fellgernon y @areyesq! Un gran equipo! https://t.co/uxbRCOpfka — Carmina Barjon (@BarjonCar) March 1, 2020 Bottomline: I learned how to insert tweets into blogposts.

item.title: About
item.description: About me: Hi! My name is Emiliano Sotelo-Fonseca. I am currently studying for a MSc degree in LANGEBIO, CINVESTAV-IRA working under the supervision of Dr. Selene Fernandez-Valverde and Dr. Kasia Oktaba. For my masterâ€™s project, I am interested in the 3D genome and bioinformatics. I am analyzing HiC data from Drosophila and Plants to see how genome topology relates (or not) to transcription, and how it impacts genome evolution. In the undergraduate program in genomic sciences at UNAM (class of ‘18), I discovered I like coding, #rstats, and thinking about how living beings process information.
